Package com.uddernetworks.emojide.gui.components

Interface EmojiComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EmojiContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomRenderedContainerFrame, DefaultEmojiComponent, DefaultEmojiContainer, EditableDynamicTextFrame, EditableStaticTextFrame, EmptyContainerFrame, HighlightedTextFrame, OutputFrame, StaticTextFrame, StyledEmojiComponent, StyledEmojiContainer, TabbedFrame, TextPromptFrame, WelcomeFrame
    public interface EmojiComponent
    A component that is rendered by a Displayer upon invoking getCachedRender().

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearCache()
      If the element should be updated during the next render.
      Emoji[][] getCachedRender()
      Gets the rendered view of the component, or the most recent cached version if applicable.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the component.
      EmojiComponent getParent()
      Gets the parent of the component.
      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the component.
      Emoji[][] render​(Emoji[][] initial)
      Gets a 2D array of Emojis, [0].length being `height` and [][0].length being `width` set in the constructor.
      void setParent​(EmojiComponent parent)
      Sets the parent of the component.
      void update()
      Updates the current component if clearCache() has been invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        Emoji[][] render​(Emoji[][] initial)
        Gets a 2D array of Emojis, [0].length being `height` and [][0].length being `width` set in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        initial - The initial Emoji grid to build on top of
        Returns:
        The emojis to render

      • getCachedRender

        Emoji[][] getCachedRender()
        Gets the rendered view of the component, or the most recent cached version if applicable. This is preferred over render(Emoji[][]) due to caching.
        Returns:
        The emojis to render

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Gets the width of the component.
        Returns:
        The width of the component.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Gets the height of the component.
        Returns:
        The height of the component.

      • getParent

        EmojiComponent getParent()
        Gets the parent of the component.
        Returns:
        The parent component

      • setParent

        void setParent​(EmojiComponent parent)
        Sets the parent of the component.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent to set

      • clearCache

        void clearCache()
        If the element should be updated during the next render. If the component has children that have cleared caches, it's vital that all parents have cleared caches as well.

      • update

        void update()
        Updates the current component if clearCache() has been invoked. All children, children's children, etc. will be updated forcibly. This could be expensive.
